scripts.alpha: yarn run local:alpha && yarn run deploy
scripts.beta: yarn run local:beta && yarn run deploy
scripts.check: yarn run depcheck && yarn run lint && yarn run release:check
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:dist && yarn run clean:tsbuildinfo
scripts.env:set: test -f env.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat env.json)"
scripts.env:set:all: yarn run env:set:alpha && yarn run env:set:beta && yarn run env:set:main
scripts.env:set:alpha: yarn run alpha:local && yarn run swap:alpha:env && yarn run env:set
scripts.env:set:beta: yarn run beta:local && yarn run swap:beta:env && yarn run env:set
scripts.env:set:main: yarn run main:local && yarn run swap:main:env && yarn run env:set
scripts.firebase:alpha: yarn run alpha:local && yarn run env:get && yarn run start:firebase
scripts.firebase:beta: yarn run beta:local && yarn run env:get && yarn run start:firebase
scripts.firebase:main: yarn run main:local && yarn run env:get && yarn run start:firebase
scripts.fix: yarn run jsonsort:fix && yarn run sort-package-json:fix && yarn run eslint:fix && yarn run prettier:fix
scripts.functions:env:set: test -f env.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat env.json)"
scripts.functions:env:set:all: yarn run functions:env:set:alpha && yarn run functions:env:set:beta && yarn run functions:env:set:main
scripts.functions:env:set:alpha: yarn run local:alpha && yarn run functions:swap:alpha && yarn run functions:env:set
scripts.functions:env:set:beta: yarn run local:beta &&  yarn run functions:swap:beta && yarn run functions:env:set
scripts.functions:env:set:main: yarn run local:main &&  yarn run functions:swap:main && yarn run functions:env:set
scripts.lint: yarn run jsonsort:check && yarn run sort-package-json:check && yarn run eslint:check && yarn run prettier:check
scripts.local:alpha: yarn run swap:alpha && firebase use alpha
scripts.local:beta: yarn run swap:beta && firebase use beta
scripts.local:main: yarn run swap:main && firebase use main
scripts.main: yarn run local:main && yarn run deploy
scripts.sentry:release: sentry-cli releases new -p sentrei ${SENTRY_RELEASE} && sentry-cli releases set-commits --auto ${SENTRY_RELEASE} && sentry-cli releases finalize ${SENTRY_RELEASE} && sentry-cli releases deploys ${SENTRY_RELEASE} new -e ${SENTRY_ENVIRONMENT}
scripts.test:firebase: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore 'jest --collect-coverage --silent && yarn run coverage:rules'
scripts.test:watch:firebase: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore 'jest --collect-coverage --watch && yarn run coverage:rules'
scripts.typescript: yarn run clean && yarn run tsc
